p.span: For each event, lookup the value of a field and return the most relevant (highest compatible) concept in a context as well as the compatibility index (CIX). The field "BestConcept" will contain the concept. The field "BestCIX" will contain the associated compatibility index.
xsFindBestConcept field [FROM context] [IN container] [BY class] [SCOPED scope] [AS outputfield]
xsFindBestConcept Height FROM Height IN MyHeight BY Male SCOPED private
In each event, determines the most compatible concept with the value of Height in the context 'Height' in the container 'MyHeight' by class 'Male' in the scope 'private'.
field, context, container, class, scope, outfield
The field in each event to look up in the container/context/class/scope.
If specified, use this as the context instead of field
The name of the container containing the context.
The scope (private, app, global) where the container is stored.
The name of the output field, instead of the default 'BestConcept'.
Each event has the fields BestConcept, containing the most compatible concept, and BestCIX, the compatibility index.
